title: Abstract server-side API client (ghApi) for git providers
description:
Abstract the direct GitHub API client to support multiple providers.

## Current State
apps/server/src/ghApi.ts - Direct GitHub API wrapper:
- Hardcodes `https://api.github.com`
- Uses GitHub-specific Accept header
- Methods: getUser, getUserRepos, getUserOrgs, getOrgRepos, getRepoBranches

## Provider API Endpoints
| Provider | Base URL | Auth Header |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| GitHub | api.github.com | Bearer token |
| GitLab | gitlab.com/api/v4 | PRIVATE-TOKEN or Bearer |
| Bitbucket | api.bitbucket.org/2.0 | Bearer token |

## API Mapping
| Feature | GitHub | GitLab | Bitbucket |
|---------|--------|--------|-----------|
| Current user | /user | /user | /user |
| User repos | /user/repos | /projects?membership=true | /repositories |
| User orgs | /user/orgs | /groups | /workspaces |
| Org repos | /orgs/:org/repos | /groups/:id/projects | /repositories/:workspace |
| Branches | /repos/:repo/branches | /projects/:id/repository/branches | /repositories/:repo/refs/branches |

## Implementation
```typescript
// apps/server/src/providerApi.ts
interface ProviderApiClient {
  getUser(): Promise<{ login: string }>
  getUserRepos(): Promise<string[]>
  getUserOrgs(): Promise<string[]>
  getOrgRepos(org: string): Promise<string[]>
  getRepoBranches(repo: string): Promise<string[]>
  getRepoBranchesWithActivity(repo: string): Promise<BranchWithActivity[]>
}

function createProviderApiClient(provider: Provider, token: string): ProviderApiClient
```

## Files to Modify
- apps/server/src/ghApi.ts → rename to providerApi.ts
- All files importing ghApi

## Considerations
- Different pagination styles (GitHub: Link header, GitLab: X-Page headers, Bitbucket: next URL)
- Different rate limit handling

|-----------------|--------|--------|-----------|

| pr.closed | pull_request.closed | merge_request.close | pullrequest:rejected/declined |
| pr.merged | pull_request.closed+merged | merge_request.merge | pullrequest:fulfilled |
| pr.updated | pull_request.synchronize | merge_request.update | pullrequest:updated |
| push | push | push | repo:push |
| comment | issue_comment | note | pullrequest:comment_* |

```typescript
// packages/convex/convex/webhook.ts (new unified handler)
async function handleWebhook(provider: string, headers: Headers, body: string) {
  const providerAdapter = getProviderWebhookAdapter(provider)
  const verified = await providerAdapter.verifySignature(headers, body)
  const normalizedEvent = providerAdapter.normalizeEvent(JSON.parse(body))
  // Route to appropriate handler
}
```

```typescript
// apps/www/lib/routes/sandboxes/client.ts
```

## Operations to Abstract
```typescript
interface FileContentsProvider {
  // Single file
  getFileContent(repo: string, path: string, ref?: string): Promise<FileContent>
  
  // Batch files
  getFileContentsBatch(repo: string, files: FileRequest[]): Promise<FileContent[]>
  
  // PR-specific
  getPRPatch(repo: string, prNumber: number): Promise<string>
  getPRChangedFiles(repo: string, prNumber: number): Promise<ChangedFile[]>

}
```
